title: Why is Eve "More Human" in All of Her Updated Skins?
body:
I'm not complaining or upset about this, legitimately just curious as for why none of the skins have her as the base skin's pale blue color. I can understand most of them being different, but at least safecracker out all of them... Why did they change her to be more human in that one? {{champion:28}} 

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-_jv_3uGl91g/Wcan8ua9SvI/AAAAAAABFHk/iEah8pQsDO4VnTOh8bt5kDa0sRzQTGUPACLcBGAs/s1600/DKZqT2NWsAAKRf1%2B%25281%2529.jpg

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/burglars_final-resized.jpg?itok=BeGymZfI

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-S-GuUn-13Qg/WcpJw_IzQDI/AAAAAAAAvnw/SUaPslgFajEWjICQb4fpYsxF6r_aiawYgCLcBGAs/s1600/evelynn_splash_4.jpg

EDIT 1: Wow, lotta fluctuating upvotes and downvotes. Again, this is something that just seemed bit odd to me that I'm curious about, and not something I'm totally against. Regardless, hope we can keep generating a good convo about this.

EDIT 2: After seeing the in-game models, I'm wondering if Riot will actually change the skin-colors in the splashes of Tango and Safecracker, as they do seem to be more reflective of the base model:
https://youtu.be/NMtmDo_e7js?t=1m14s
